dt-option.name: searchPanes.panes.header
dt-option.summary: Define the header for custom panes

type.description: The `-init searchPanes.panes.header` string allows a custom header to be set for custom panes.

dt-option.default: The default value of `-init searchPanes.panes.header` is the string `Custom Pane` to make it clear that it is a custom Pane for developers. In most cases this value will be overwritten to a more relevant value to the purpose.
dt-option.description:
As standard, Custom panes will be titled with the string "Custom Pane".
Setting `-init searchPanes.panes.header` to any other string value will cause that string to be displayed in the title of the Pane. In most cases it will be preferable to overwrite this value.
